website_summaries.verdict: Part of the most established line of Adidas Golf, the Tour360 XT SL BOA brings its A-game to the course. There are some updates that are applied to the shoe that users have taken notice of. The BOA closure system and the X-Traxion system are just some of them. Those on the hunt for a piece that is suitable for wet and dry conditions can take note of this item.
pros: The improved BOA lacing system is a hit for many users
The fact that it can be adjusted in seconds comes in useful
A high percentage of golf enthusiasts are satisfied with the waterproofing feature as it keeps the feet completely dry even in wet conditions
Several consumers highlight the grip of this Adidas golf shoe
It works excellently on wet and dry grounds and because of the X-shaped treads
It plants on the ground firmly, helping the player feel more confident in making a swing
A couple of purchasers are delighted with how the trainer accommodates the foot
It has a roomy toebox and is available in regular and wide widths
Several commenters notice the high-quality materials that coat the shoe
Some wearers take notice of the Boost technology and the comfort it provides for long walks
The Adidas Tour360 XT SL BOA brings performance and looks together
cons: One says that the construction of the tongue causes pressure and pain on the top of the foot
A reviewer feels disappointed that the sole starts to separate after a few months

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very good at first but after several time wearing it, it became extremely uncomfortable. The knob on the top pushes the cover down on your ankle. Too bad, I love the design but it is not a practical shoes .
customer_reviews.author: REZA

customer_reviews.title: Whomever is filling this order doesn't know the difference between "medium" and "wide"
customer_reviews.text: I have order this shoe twice, in a medium width. Both times, it arrived is "Wide", and I have had to return them. I can't actually review the product, because I'm not getting what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Aspinwall

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes, BOA Tie is Different-May Not Be For Everyone
customer_reviews.text: I like the styling and quality, but the BOA tie is different. I use these for my indoor simulator, but I wonder how the large plastic dial would feel after walking a round. Great for what I bought them for, but maybe look at the BOA twist shoe ties if your not familiar.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip W.

customer_reviews.title: The tongue is too long
customer_reviews.text: When you tighten up, the front disc pushes down on the tongue, which forces the front edge to push into the top of your foot.
customer_reviews.author: Gary N.

customer_reviews.title: Defect
customer_reviews.text: Just received pair of Adidas Tour 360XT Spikeless Boa golf shoes from Carl's Golfland. My first first from this seller. Opened the package and right away the right shoes leather stitching is uneven. When worn, feels uneven. Returning this item. Disappointed with Adidas poor workmanship and QC. Definitely returning this shoes and try different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding shoe for all conditions
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and support. Sole is very versatile for all conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Tim McDonald

customer_reviews.title: amazing comfort
customer_reviews.text: simply the most comfortable golf shoes have the Adidas brand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for orthotics
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to find golf shoes that work well with orthotics. Most shove your feet too high in the shoe and the changed angle causes your heel pops out. Not these - the Boa tightening system anchors the foot down comfortably and easily allows the orthotic to be removed (handy if you switch them between shoes). Most comfortable golf shoe I've ever worn and I can't recommend it highly enough
customer_reviews.author: P. Denniston

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit perfectly with no issues whatsoever! Don’t understand the negative reviews except for maybe the one that had the bad luck defective pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Design needs tweaking
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. The only issue I had was the tongue was hitting to high on the front of my ankles
customer_reviews.author: Stephen T

customer_reviews.title: Above Avg
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes. Great fit. Great tread. Comfortable insole, always go 1/2 size up with Adidas because I have a wide foot, fits perfectly. Beautiful shoes
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hucks

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: I bought it from Adidas.com. Poor quality product and bad customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Sungwhan

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Tour360 Xt Spikeless Boa Golf Shoe
product_meta.description: A premium look for the course. Designed for a custom fit using an innovative boa® closure system, these men's golf shoes feature a microfiber synthetic leather upper. A boost midsole gives you responsive cushioning all through your round, while climastorm provides breathable protection in wet conditions.
feature_bullets: L6 Boa Closure System on tongue top for easy customizable micro-adjustability
Breathable, water-repellent Climastorm upper while 360Wrap locks in and supports the foot
Spikeless Puremotion outsole for enhanced flexibility and grip with X-Traxion primary lugs for grip and balance
Torsion X stability bar from ground up and INSITE Sockliner for fit and balance
Microfiber leather heel lining for fit and comfort
